mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, admin_name adminName, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate, notice_ip noticeIp FROM dev_notice WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND notice_kind = 'notice' ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_notice WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND notice_kind = 'notice'

SELECT notice_no noticeNo, admin_name adminName, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate, notice_ip noticeIp, notice_kind noticeKind FROM dev_notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dev_notice( admin_name, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_ip, notice_kind ) VALUES( #{adminName}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), #{noticeIp}, 'notice' )
